Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;malt^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Nice. Note that if you need dark malt, you just need to put back your malt into the ^orange;Furnace^white; and cook it some more.

Time to use some new stations. First, put one piece of ^orange;wheat^white; into the ^green;Rain Barrel^white;. Once it's soaked, put it into the ^green;Sprouting Table^white;. Then take your sprouted wheat and place it into a ^orange;Campfire^white;.
